snippet: ALI--Muhammad. On behalf of the children, adolescents and families we support, the Board of Directors and Staff of Birch Family Services extend our condolences to Lonnie Ali on the loss of her husband. He was a true champion. His generosity and strength was an inspiration for those who needed a voice. Our prayers are with you and your family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ALI--Muhammad. On behalf of the children, adolescents and families we support, the Board of Directors and Staff of Birch Family Services extend our condolences to Lonnie Ali on the loss of her husband. He was a true champion. His generosity and strength was an inspiration for those who needed a voice. Our prayers are with you and your family. 1/3
